short_description: Discover the diverse landscapes and vibrant cities of Australia, from the iconic Sydney Opera House to the vast Outback, stunning beaches, and unique wildlife. Experience world-class dining, outdoor adventures, and the laid-back Aussie lifestyle.

alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Minors are prohibited to consume alcohol beverages in public
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, bottle shops, and some supermarkets

tipping.hotels: Tipping is not mandatory but appreciated for exceptional service. $1-2 per bag for porters is common
tipping.guides: 10-15% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: Tipping is not mandatory but 10% is appreciated for good service. Some restaurants may add a service charge
tipping.taxis: Tipping is not expected but rounding up the fare is common

weather.title: Australia has diverse climates ranging from tropical in the north to temperate in the south, with arid conditions in the interior. The seasons are opposite to the Northern Hemisphere.

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Warm to hot temperatures across most of the country. Perfect for beach activities, outdoor adventures, and exploring coastal cities. Great time to visit Sydney, Melbourne, and the Great Barrier Reef

when_to_visit.title: Autumn
when_to_visit.short_description: Mild and pleasant weather with fewer crowds. Ideal for city breaks, wine regions, and outdoor activities. Great time for sightseeing and exploring national parks

when_to_visit.title: Winter
when_to_visit.short_description: Cooler temperatures in the south, perfect for skiing in the Australian Alps. Northern regions remain warm and dry, making it ideal for exploring the Outback and tropical regions

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Australia depends on the region, but generally spring (September to November) and autumn (March to May) offer mild temperatures and comfortable weather for exploring cities, beaches, and natural attractions
